title: Real interest rate is adjusted for PL changes

content.question: The real interest rate earned is the

choices.label: same as the nominal interest rate when inflation is moderate
cost of borrowing in current consumer prices
cost of borrowing in current producer prices
cost of borrowing adjusted for the rate of change in the price level
nominal interest rate adjusted for the growth rate of the economy

content.answer: cost of borrowing adjusted for the rate of change in the price level

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
